
t 0 0 starting area

# center platform
p -200   200      200  200     16  0

# left platform
p -200   200    -200   100    16  0
p -200   100    -400   100    16  0
p -400   100    -400  -600    16  0

# right platform
p 200   200     200   050    16  0
p 200   050     100   000    16  0
p 100   000     500   000    16  0
p 500   000     500   200    16  0
p 500 200   800 200 16 1
p 800 200 800 -100 16 0
p 800 -100 1200 -100 16 0

m -50 232 [wasd] -> move
m -50 248 [i] -> jump

t 1 0 platforms i
c 1 0 1100 -150
p 1200 -100 1200 200 16 0
p 1200 200 1600 200 16 1
p 1600 200 1600 -100 16 0
p 1600 -100 1800 -100 16 0
p 1800 -100 1800 200 16 0
p 1800 200 2300 200 16 1
p 2300 200 2300 000 16 0
p 2300 000 2500 000 16 0
p 2500 000 2500 100 16 0
p 2500 100 2700 200 16 0
p 2700 200 3200 200 16 0

t 2 0 ledges
c 2 0 2000 -90
p 3200 200 3200 300 16 0
p 3200 300 3800 300 16 0
p 3800 300 3800 100 16 0
p 3800 100 4000 100 16 0
p 4000 100 4000 -200 16 0
p 4000 -200 4400 -200 16 0
p 4400 -200 4400 -600 16 0
m 680 50 [wasd] + [u] (in-air) -> dash

t 2 -1 platforms ii
p 4400 -600 4800 -600 16 0
p 4000 -800 3500 -800 16 0
p 4400 -1000 5200 -1000 16 0
